TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WSFederationAuthenticationModule extends System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase

summary.span: 是一个 HTTP 模块，它通过在传入请求中强制执行联合身份验证设置来保护 ASP.NET 应用程序。

span.span: The is an HTTP module which is used to secure an ASP.NET application by enforcing federated authentication settings on incoming requests.

summary.span: 是 WIF 提供的现成可用的主要模块，用于在 ASP.NET 应用程序中处理基于声明的标识访问。

span.span: The is the main module that WIF offers out of the box for handling claims-based identity access in ASP.NET applications.

summary.span: 引发几个事件，它允许 ASP.NET 开发人员更改默认行为和控制身份验证和声明处理如何发生的细节。

span.span: The raises several events, which allows ASP.NET developers to change the default behavior and control the details of how authentication and claims processing take place.

summary.span: 功能被分为任务具体的方法。

span.span: The functionality is divided into task-specific methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类实现已知 WS 联合身份验证模块 (WSFAM) 作为 HTTP 模块。The class implements an HTTP module known as the WS-Federation Authentication Module (WSFAM). WSFAM 实现现成的 Windows Identity Foundation (WIF)。The WSFAM is implemented out of the box by Windows Identity Foundation (WIF). 通过在 web.config 文件中进行输入情况下，WSFAM 添加到 ASP.NET 管道。The WSFAM is added to the ASP.NET pipeline by making an entry in the web.config file. 它派生自，该类实现。It derives from , which implements . 注册 ASP.NET 运行时来侦听和事件。It registers with the ASP.NET runtime to listen for the and events. 侦听事件，允许将客户端重定向到安全令牌服务 (STS) 获取安全令牌，授权对请求的资源失败时 WSFAM。Listening to the event, lets the WSFAM redirect clients to a security token service (STS) to obtain a security token when authorization fails on a requested resource. 侦听事件使 WSFAM 监视包含请求的令牌的 sts 的响应的 HTTP 请求。Listening to the event enables the WSFAM to monitor HTTP requests for a response from the STS that contains the requested token. 存在并且有效此类标记时，它创建的实例身份验证的用户使用的令牌中存在的声明。When such a token is present and valid, it creates an instance of for the authenticated user using the claims that are present in the token. 当使用 WSFAM，由一个会话身份验证模块 (SAM)，即实例提供会话管理的从它派生的类或类。When using the WSFAM, session management is provided by a session authentication module (SAM), which is an instance of the class, or a class derived from it. SAM 也将添加到 ASP.NET 管道配置文件中。The SAM is also added to the ASP.NET pipeline in the configuration file. SAM 监视 （会话） 的身份验证 cookie 的请求。The SAM monitors requests for authentication (session) cookies. 该模块存在并且有效这些 cookie 时，提取身份验证的用户从和设置属性和线程主体属性。When these cookies are present and valid, the module extracts the for the authenticated user from the and sets the property and the thread principal properties. WSFAM 提供：The WSFAM provides: - ASP.NET 应用程序将向安全令牌服务 (STS) 的身份验证外包使用 WS 联合身份验证协议功能。The ability for an ASP.NET application to outsource authentication to a security token service (STS) by using the WS-Federation protocol. 标识可以跨一个或多个标识领域联合，并且涉及多个 Sts。Identity can be federated across one or more identity realms and involve multiple STSs. - ASP.NET 应用程序基于声明的标识。Claims-based identity for ASP.NET applications. 身份验证，期间 WSFAM 生成从 sts 发送的安全令牌中的声明主体，并以线程的主体中设置此声明主体。During authentication, the WSFAM builds a principal from the claims in the security token sent by the STS and sets this claims principal as the thread principal. 然后可以使用此主体以便进行授权、 演示文稿和有关它表示的用户的逻辑决策在代码中。You can then use this principal to make further authorization, presentation, and logic decisions about the user it represents in your code. WSFAM 公开提供要使用 WS 联合身份验证登录和注销请求上的消息参数的默认值的多个属性。The WSFAM exposes several properties that provide default message parameters to use on WS-Federation sign-in and sign-out requests. 这些属性通常从初始化[ <wsFederation> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/wsfederation.md)配置文件中的元素。These properties are typically initialized from the [<wsFederation>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/wsfederation.md) element in a configuration file. 最重要的这些属性是：The most important of these properties are: - 属性，用于指定要将 WS 联合身份验证登录和注销请求发送到安全令牌服务 (STS) 的地址。The property, which specifies the address of the security token service (STS) to which to send WS-Federation sign-in and sign-out requests. - 属性，用于在 WS 联合身份验证登录请求中指定要使用的 wtrealm 参数。The property, which specifies the wtrealm parameter to use in WS-Federation sign-in requests. Wtrealm 参数标识对 STS 的信赖方 (RP) 应用程序的安全领域。The wtrealm parameter identifies the security realm of the relying party (RP) application to the STS. 登录消息参数还可以更改基于每个请求通过提供的一个事件处理程序委托事件。Sign-in message parameters can also be changed on a per-request basis by providing an event-handler delegate for the event. 两个属性控制该模块的行为。Two properties control the behavior of the module. 这两种属性通常还初始化从``配置中的元素。Both of these properties are also typically initialized from the `` element in configuration. - 属性指定模块是否应进行身份验证执行被动重定向到 STS。The property specifies whether the module should perform passive redirects to the STS for authentication. - 属性指定是否应持久会话。The property specifies whether sessions should be persistent. 如果此属性设置为 true，SAM 用于写入客户端的会话 cookie。If this property is set true, the SAM is used to write a session cookie to the client. 在从客户端的后续请求，SAM 提供身份验证使用的标记保留在会话 cookie。On subsequent requests from the client, the SAM provides authentication by using the token persisted in the session cookie. WSFAM 在登录期间引发了多个事件，并注销，它允许 ASP.NET 开发人员来更改该模块的默认行为和控制如何身份验证和声明处理发生的详细信息。The WSFAM raises several events during sign-in and sign-out, which allow ASP.NET developers to change the default behavior of the module and control the details of how authentication and claims processing take place. WS 联合身份验证登录请求发送到 STS 之前，将引发以下事件：The following events are raised before the WS-Federation sign-in request is sent to the STS: - ： 当启用被动重定向和授权请求的资源上失败时引发。: Raised when passive redirect is enabled and authorization fails on a requested resource. - ： 之前引发 WSFAM 发送到 STS WS 联合身份验证登录请求。: Raised just before the WSFAM sends the WS-Federation sign-in request to the STS. 此事件可用于更改登录请求中的参数。You can use this event to change the parameters in the sign-in request. 从 STS 收到登录响应 （颁发安全令牌） 时，将引发以下事件：The following events are raised when a sign-in response (issued security token) is received from the STS: - ： 由 STS 发送的安全令牌从响应中读取后引发。: Raised just after the security token sent by the STS is read from the response. - ： 验证令牌后引发。: Raised just after the token has been validated. 此事件可用于筛选、 转换或添加到声明主体的声明 () 从安全令牌创建。You can use this event to filter, transform, or add claims to the claims principal () created from the security token. - ： 只需在会话令牌之前引发 () 从主体用来设置线程的主体的声明和当前用户创建，并且会写入到会话 cookie。: Raised just before the session token () created from the claims principal is used to set the thread principal and current user and is written to the session cookie. 使你能够修改会话令牌或启用或禁用编写会话 cookie。Gives you an opportunity to modify the session token or enable or disable writing the session cookie. - ： 在身份验证的末尾后引发已设置线程的主体和当前用户。: Raised at the end of the authentication just after the thread principal and current user have been set. - ： 如果在登录过程中发生异常引发。: Raised if an exception occurs during sign-in. 你可以取消请求，并阻止异常返回到调用方。You can cancel the request and prevent the exception from being returned to the caller. 登录时超出会话或处理 WS 联合身份验证注销清除请求 (wsignoutcleanup1.0) 时，将引发以下事件：When signing out of a session or when processing a WS-Federation sign-out clean-up request (wsignoutcleanup1.0), the following events are raised: - ： 引发在会话中删除，使您可以执行任何可能取决于会话的清理工作也可以取消注销之前。: Raised just before the session is deleted to enable you to perform any cleanup that might depend on the session or to cancel sign-out. - ： 会话已被删除后引发。: Raised just after the session has been deleted. - ： 如果注销过程中发生异常引发。你可以取消注销，并阻止异常返回到调用方。: Raised if an exception occurs during sign-out. You can cancel sign-out and prevent the exception from being returned to the caller. > [!NOTE] > 时通过调用注销在 STS，将不会引发注销事件方法。The sign-out events are not raised when signing out at the STS by calling the method. 有两种方法的登录到使用 WSFAM STS。There are two ways of signing in to an STS using WSFAM. 第一种是通过启用通过被动重定向属性。The first is by enabling passive redirects through the property. 在这种情况下，如果授权失败，则在请求的资源，而不返回`401:Access Denied`响应客户端，WSFAM 生成其属性的 WS 联合身份验证登录请求消息并将客户端重定向到 STS，若要检索的安全令牌。In this case, when authorization fails on a requested resource, rather than returning a `401:Access Denied` response to the client, WSFAM builds a WS-Federation sign-in request message from its properties and redirects the client to the STS to retrieve a security token. 第二种方法是显式客户端重定向到 STS 通过调用从网页或应用程序中的自定义控件的方法。The second way is to explicitly redirect the client to the STS by calling the method from a web page or custom control in your application. 方法还使用 WSFAM 的属性来构造登录请求。The method also uses the properties of the WSFAM to construct the sign-in request. 任何重载方法可以用于注销会话。Any of the overloaded methods can be used to sign out of the session. 这将删除客户端上的会话 cookie。This deletes the session cookie on the client. 它不向 STS 发送 Ws-federation 注销消息 ("wsignout1.0")。It does not send a WS-Federation sign-out message ("wsignout1.0") to the STS. 注销在 STS，你必须使用方法。To sign-out at the STS, you must use the method. WSFAM 处理通过使用客户端中删除其会话的 WS 联合身份验证注销清除请求 ("wsignoutcleanup1.0")。The WSFAM handles WS-Federation sign-out clean-up requests ("wsignoutcleanup1.0"), by deleting its session with the client. 如果未设置注销的清理消息中的 wreply 参数，WSFAM 将返回到发送消息的 STS 的绿色的复选标记映像。If the wreply parameter in the sign-out clean-up message is not set, the WSFAM returns an image of a green check mark to the STS that sent the message. 作为一条确认，RP 已完成其注销，STS 可以使用此功能。This feature can be used by an STS as an acknowledgment that the RP has completed its sign-out. WSFAM 公开其功能 — 例如，其请求处理管道-通过几种特定于任务的方法。The WSFAM exposes its functionality -- for example, its request processing pipeline -- through several task-specific methods. 你可以重写这些方法在派生类中以改变 WSFAM 的行为。You can override these methods in derived classes to alter the behavior of the WSFAM. 要使用，必须将模块添加到管道如下面的 XML 中所示：To be used, the module must be added to the pipeline as in the following XML: ``` ``` 一次配置，处理 HTTP 请求的各个阶段中引发的事件。Once configured, the raises events at various stages of processing an HTTP request. ASP.NET 开发人员可以处理这些事件在 global.asax 文件中。ASP.NET developers can handle these events in the global.asax file. ## Examples [!code-csharp[WifWSFAM#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifwsfam/cs/webapplication1/global.asax.cs#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wauth 参数是可选的。The wauth parameter is optional. 如果属性设置为`null`或空字符串，wauth 参数不包含在登录请求。If the property is set to `null` or an empty string, the wauth parameter is not included in the sign-in request. 可以通过添加的处理程序重写此设置在每个 HTTP 请求事件。You can override this setting on each HTTP request by adding a handler for the event. 该模块将重定向到与 WS 联合身份验证登录请求消息的安全令牌服务 (STS) 之前，将引发此事件。This event is raised just before the module redirects to the security token service (STS) with a WS-Federation sign-in request message. 通过指定 STS属性。The STS is specified by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时授权失败的 HTTP 请求将引发事件。The event is raised when authorization has failed for an HTTP request. 将引发此事件从通过调用事件处理程序委托方法。It is raised from within the event-handler delegate through a call to the method. 你可以设置属性控制是否请求重定向到标识提供程序。You can set the property to control whether the request is redirected to the identity provider. 框架初始化该属性为`false`如果用户已经过身份验证。The framework initializes this property to `false` if the user has already been authenticated. 在这种情况下，将属性设置为`true`可能导致与 STS 产生循环。In this case, setting the property to `true` may cause a circular loop with the STS. > [!NOTE] > 事件可以用于修改 URL 或取消重定向。The event can be used to modify the URL or cancel the redirect. 若要处理此事件 ASP.NET 应用程序中的，创建一个名为方法`WSFederationAuthentication_AuthorizationFailed`global.asax 文件中。To handle this event in an ASP.NET application, create a method named `WSFederationAuthentication_AuthorizationFailed` in the global.asax file. ## Examples [!code-csharp[WifWSFAM#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifwsfam/cs/webapplication1/global.asax.cs#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从请求处理管道，以确定传入的 HTTP 请求是否包含 WS 联合身份验证登录响应消息的窗体发布请求调用此方法。This method is invoked from the request processing pipeline to determine whether the incoming HTTP request is a FORM post that contains a WS-Federation sign-in response message. 它将调用重载`onPage`参数集`false`以指示调用未并非来源处理页时。It invokes the overload with the `onPage` parameter set `false` to indicate that the call did not originate while processing a page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从请求处理管道通过调用此方法重载，以确定传入的 HTTP 请求是否的表单 POST 包含 WS 联合身份验证登录响应消息。This method is invoked from the request processing pipeline through the overload to determine whether the incoming HTTP request is a form POST that contains a WS-Federation sign-in response message. 默认实现执行下列任务：The default implementation performs the following: - 如果传入请求是窗体 POST，则会调用方法来确定是否包含登录响应的窗体 POST。If the incoming request is a form POST, it calls the method to determine whether the form POST contains a sign-in response. - 如果传入的请求不是窗体 POST，并且该请求包含 Ws-federation 注销清除请求 （wa 参数为"wsignoutcleanup1.0"），则执行注销清理。If the incoming request is not a form POST, and the request contains a WS-Federation sign-out clean-up request (the wa parameter is "wsignoutcleanup1.0"), sign-out clean-up is performed. 在这种情况下，调用方法 (参数设置为`true`以指示注销清理) 若要注销会话。In this case, the method is invoked (with the parameter set to `true` to indicate a sign-out clean-up) to sign out of the session. 这也会导致注销要引发的事件。This also causes the sign-out events to be raised. 接下来，如果注销清除请求包含 wreply 参数，则客户端定向到返回的 URL方法; 否则为一个绿色复选标记的映像返回到 STS。Next, if the sign-out clean-up request contains a wreply parameter, the client is redirected to the URL returned by the method; otherwise, an image of a green check mark is returned to the STS. 此映像的回执可以用作 sts 注销清除请求已接收并成功处理 RP 一条确认消息。The receipt of this image can be used by the STS as a confirmation that the sign-out clean-up request was received and successfully processed by the RP.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建一个 WS 联合身份验证登录请求，由表示对象。Creates a WS-Federation sign-in request that is represented by a object. 新属性对象设置，如下所示：The properties of the new object are set as follows: - 属性 （wctx 参数） 设置为所创建的使用方法的参数值。The property (the wctx parameter) is set to a value created by using the method parameters. - 属性 （wct 参数） 设置为当前时间。The property (the wct parameter) is set to the current time. - 所有其他属性是使用设置的当前实例的等效属性。All other properties are set by using the equivalent properties of the current instance. 传递给方法的参数用于创建 wctx 消息参数。The parameters passed to the method are used to create the wctx message parameter. 这是具有以下格式的字符串： `ru=returnUrl&cx=SignInContext&rm=rememberMeSet&id=uniqueId`。This is a string with the following format: `ru=returnUrl&cx=SignInContext&rm=rememberMeSet&id=uniqueId`. - `ru`值设置为的值`returnUrl`参数中传递给该方法并指定该模块应将定向到以下的成功身份验证的浏览器的 URL。The `ru` value is set to the value of the `returnUrl` parameter passed in to the method and it specifies the URL that the module should direct the browser to following successful authentication. 这是唯一的值存储在由 WSFAM wctx 字符串。This is the only value stored in the wctx string that is used by the WSFAM. 模块调用方法以处理 WS 联合身份验证登录响应时，会从 wctx 参数中提取此值。The module calls the method to extract this value from the wctx parameter when processing a WS-Federation sign-in response. 不应与 wreply 消息参数，由指定混淆属性并提供在安全令牌服务 (STS) 应将其响应定向到 RP 的地址。It should not be confused with the wreply message parameter, which is specified by the property and which provides the address at the RP to which the security token service (STS) should direct its response. - `cx`参数设置的值为属性。The `cx` parameter is set to the value of the property. 此属性被公开的从而使您能够设置应存储在 wctx 字符串中; 任何应用程序定义的上下文但是，WSFAM 不公开一个方法以提取响应中的此值。This property is exposed to enable you to set any application-defined context that should be stored in the wctx string; however, WSFAM does not expose a method to extract this value in the response. 如果你的应用程序需要值，则必须提供代码以分析 wctx 字符串并处理响应时读取此值。If the value is needed by your application, you must provide the code to parse the wctx string and read this value when processing the response. 你可能完成此操作通过重写方法。You might accomplish this by overriding the method. - 既不`rm`值，该值设置为值`rememberMeSet`参数，也不`id`参数，该设置的值为参数`uniqueId`WSFAM 通过使用参数。Neither the `rm` value, which is set to the value of the `rememberMeSet` parameter, nor the `id` parameter, which is set to the value of the `uniqueId` parameter are used by WSFAM. 这些可以设置为任何值。These can be set to any value. 方法调用从方法。The method is called from the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法以将 WS 联合身份验证注销请求消息发送到指定的 STS。Call this method to send a WS-Federation sign-out request message to the specified STS. （可选） 可以提供注销请求中的 wreply 参数的值。You can optionally supply a value for the wreply parameter in the sign-out request. 方法执行以下任务：The method does the following: 1. 通过使用指定的参数创建 WS 联合身份验证的注销请求消息。Creates a WS-Federation sign-out request message by using the specified parameters. 2. 调用方法 SAM 删除会话 cookie。Calls the method on the SAM to delete the session cookie. 3. 重定向到 STS 使用来自第一步的注销请求消息。Redirects to the STS using the sign-out request message from the first step. 没有一个注销事件： ， ，或由此方法引发。None of the sign-out events: , , or are raised by this method. 若要删除会话而无需注销请求消息发送到 STS，调用的重载之一方法。To delete the session without sending a sign-out request message to the STS, call one of the overloaded methods. > [!NOTE] > 若要通过使用会话令牌执行被动注销，该模块，依赖于一个值，存储在属性期间登录，有关详细信息，请参阅方法。To perform passive sign-out by using the session token, the module relies on a value that was stored in the property during sign-in, for more information, see the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从请求处理管道调用此方法 (方法) 在成功登录后获取的第一页的信赖方 (RP) 以客户端定向到的 URL。This method is called from the request processing pipeline (the method) to get the URL of the page at the relying party (RP) to direct the client to after successful sign-in. 这是，通常情况下，向其客户端最初请求访问 RP 资源的 URL。This is, typically, the URL of the RP resource to which the client originally requested access. 默认情况下，WSFAM 时它将 WS 联合身份验证登录请求发送到安全令牌服务 (STS) 将保存在 wctx 消息参数的返回 URL。By default, WSFAM saves the return URL inside the wctx message parameter when it sends the WS-Federation sign-in request to the security token service (STS). WS 联合身份验证规范中，根据 wctx 参数保留的实体，通过该消息将传递，并且是返回未更改发送 sts WS 联合身份验证登录响应消息中。In accordance with the WS-Federation specification, the wctx parameter is preserved across entities through which the message passes and is returned unaltered in the WS-Federation sign-in response message that is sent by the STS. 默认实现从 wctx 参数登录响应中获取的返回 URL。The default implementation gets the return URL from the wctx parameter in the sign-in response. 由 WSFAM wctx 参数的格式的详细信息，请参阅方法。For more information about the format of the wctx parameter that is used by WSFAM, see the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法调用从在请求处理管道，以确定要处理 WS 联合身份验证注销清除请求后重定向到的 URL 中的方法。This method is called from the method in the request processing pipeline to determine the URL to redirect to after processing a WS-Federation sign-out clean-up request. 如果消息具有 wreply 参数仅调用 (`signOutMessage`参数具有既不是属性`null`也不为空)。It is only invoked if the message has a wreply parameter (the `signOutMessage` parameter has a property that is neither `null` nor empty). 默认实现验证消息中包含的答复 URL (属性) 针对指定的安全令牌服务 (STS) 的地址属性。The default implementation validates the reply URL contained in the message (the property) against the address of the security token service (STS) that is specified by the property. 必须满足才能有效的答复 url 以下条件：The following conditions must be true for the reply URL to be valid: 1. 回复 URL 是绝对 URL。The reply URL is an absolute URL. 2. 答复 URL 必须与颁发者的同一方案。The reply URL has the same scheme as the issuer. 3. 答复 URL 必须与颁发者的同一端口。The reply URL has the same port as the issuer. 4. 回复 URL 具有颁发者的同一主机，或者答复 URL 指定的颁发者的子域。Either the reply URL has the same host as the issuer or the reply URL specifies a sub-domain of the issuer. 如果所有这些条件都为 true，则返回的答复 URL （答复）;否则，通过指定 URL返回属性。If all of these conditions are true, the reply URL (Reply) is returned; otherwise, the URL specified by the property is returned. 重写该方法以提供其他验证答复 URL。Override this method to provide additional validation for the reply URL.

span.span: Handles the event from the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] pipeline.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法实现的 WS 联合身份验证请求处理管道。The method implements the WS-Federation request processing pipeline. 将其添加到中的事件[!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]按管道方法。It is added to the event in the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] pipeline by the method. 方法执行下列任务：The method performs the following: 1. 调用方法来确定是否收到了 WS 联合身份验证登录响应消息 ("wsignin1.0")。Calls the method to determine whether a WS-Federation sign-in response message ("wsignin1.0") has been received. 如果响应为 WS 联合身份验证注销清除请求 ("wsignoutcleanup1.0")处理消息、 终止请求并根据请求中的 WS 联合身份验证参数将客户端重定向。If the response is a WS-Federation sign-out clean-up request ("wsignoutcleanup1.0"), processes the message, terminates the request and redirects the client according to the WS-Federation parameters in the request. 如果消息不是登录响应或注销清除请求，该模块只返回;否则，它执行以下步骤以处理登录响应。If the message is not a sign-in response or a sign-out clean-up request, the module just returns; otherwise it performs the following steps to process the sign-in response. 2. 调用方法来反序列化请求的对象。Calls the method to deserialize a object from the request. 3. 引发 事件。Raises the event. 您可以取消进一步处理或修改此事件的处理程序中的已接收的安全令牌。You can cancel further processing or modify the received security token in a handler for this event. 处理程序通常用于修改或属性。A handler is typically used to modify the or properties. 4. 验证安全令牌，并创建从安全令牌中的声明的对象。Validates the security token and creates a object from the claims in the security token. 5. 引发 事件。Raises the event. 您可以取消进一步处理或修改此事件的处理程序中的声明主体。You can cancel further processing or modify the claims principal in a handler for this event. 6. 使用配置的会话的身份验证模块 (SAM) 来创建对象。Uses the configured session authentication module (SAM) to create a object. (配置的 SAM 是返回对象属性。)使用在步骤 5 中返回的声明主体创建的会话令牌。(The configured SAM is the object returned by the property.) The session token is created by using the claims principal returned in step 5. 和通过设置属性和属性返回步骤 3 中，并根据当前时间和令牌生存期由任一验证或属性正由 WSFAM 令牌处理程序集合中的对象。The and properties are set by using the and properties of the returned in step 3 and are validated against the current time and the token lifetime specified by either the or the property of the object in the token handler collection being used by WSFAM. 可以通过配置中指定有关会话令牌处理程序的令牌生存期[ <sessionTokenRequirement> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/sessiontokenrequirement.md)元素。The token lifetime on the session token handler can be specified in configuration through the [<sessionTokenRequirement>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/sessiontokenrequirement.md) element. 注意：上配置 SAM 则不使用 cookie 处理程序的属性。Note: The property on the cookie handler configured for the SAM is not used. 7. 调用与要编写会话 cookie 的会话令牌的方法。Calls the method with the session token to write the session cookie. 方法第一个引发事件。The method first raises the event. 你可以更改会话令牌的属性或更改是否应在此事件的处理程序中保留的 cookie。You can change properties on the session token or change whether the cookie should be persisted in a handler for this event. 引发该事件后，该方法然后将使用 SAM 的 cookie。After the event is raised, the method then writes the cookie using the SAM. > [!NOTE] > 在配置中的设置不用于写入 cookie。The set in configuration is not used to write the cookie. 8. 调用方法来引发事件。Calls the method to raise the event. 9. 调用方法以获取要将客户端重定向到 RP 页。Calls the method to get the RP page to which to redirect the client. 默认情况下，此方法从登录响应中的 wctx 参数读取返回的 URL。By default, this method reads the return URL from the wctx parameter in the sign-in response. 有关如何 WSFAM 存储返回的 URL 的详细信息，请参阅方法。For more information about how WSFAM stores the return URL, see the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以访问和修改请求通过 WS 联合身份验证登录属性。You can access and modify the WS-Federation sign-in request through the property. 例如，你可以修改登录消息更改请求将重定向到的标识提供程序中的属性。For example, you can modify the property in the sign-in message to change the identity provider to which the request will be redirected. 事件为可取消的事件，可以设置属性`true`取消重定向。The event is a cancelable event and you can set the property to `true` to cancel the redirect. 此事件由引发内部方法通过调用方法。The event is raised from inside the method through a call to the method. 若要处理此事件 ASP.NET 应用程序中的，创建调用的方法`WSFederationAuthentication_RedirectingToIdentityProvider`global.asax 文件中。To handle this event in an ASP.NET application, create a method called `WSFederationAuthentication_RedirectingToIdentityProvider` in the global.asax file. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何添加的处理程序中的事件`Application_Init`global.asax 文件中的事件。The following code shows how to add a handler for the event in the `Application_Init` event in the global.asax file. 代码摘自`FederationForWebApps`示例。The code is taken from the `FederationForWebApps` sample. 有关此示例的详细信息，请参阅[WIF 代码示例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For more information about this sample, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). 下面的代码演示的处理程序事件中的的 global.asax 文件中的 RP。The following code shows the handler for the event in the in the global.asax file of an RP. 代码检查是否传入的 HTTP 请求包含 whr 参数，并且，如果存在，会将此参数设置上的 WS 联合身份验证登录请求将发送到 STS。The code checks to see whether the incoming HTTP request contains a whr parameter, and, if it does, it sets this parameter on the WS-Federation sign-in request that will be sent to the STS. 代码摘自`FederationForWebApps`示例。The code is taken from the `FederationForWebApps` sample. 有关此示例的详细信息，请参阅[WIF 代码示例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For more information about this sample, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). 下面的代码演示的处理程序事件中的的 global.asax 文件中的联合身份验证提供程序 STS。The following code shows the handler for the event in the in the global.asax file of a federation provider STS. 代码检查传入的 HTTP 请求是否包含 whr 参数。The code checks to see whether the incoming HTTP request contains a whr parameter. 如果请求包含 whr 参数，将客户端定向到登录; 的 IP STS否则，将客户端定向到主领域发现页上，选择用于登录的 IP STS。If the request contains the whr parameter, the client is directed to the IP-STS for sign-in; if not, the client is directed to a home realm discovery page to select the IP-STS at which to sign in. 代码摘自`FederationForWebApps`示例。The code is taken from the `FederationForWebApps` sample. 有关此示例的详细信息，请参阅[WIF 代码示例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For more information about this sample, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用从方法时提供通过信赖方 (RP) 或从在网页上发出请求要对被动重定向到标识提供程序执行的事件处理程序委托授权失败。The method is called from the method when the request is issued from a web page presented by the relying party (RP) or from the event-handler delegate to perform a passive redirect to the identity provider on authorization failure. 传递给方法的参数用于创建 wctx 消息参数。The parameters passed to the method are used to create the wctx message parameter. 唯一显著参数是`returnUrl`参数。The only significant parameter is the `returnUrl` parameter. 这指定 RP 应将定向到以下的成功身份验证的浏览器的 URL。This specifies the URL that the RP should direct the browser to following successful authentication. 不应与 wreply 消息参数，由指定混淆属性并提供在安全令牌服务 (STS) 应将其响应定向到 RP 的地址。It should not be confused with the wreply message parameter, which is specified by the property and which provides the address at the RP to which the security token service (STS) should direct its response. 方法执行下列任务：The method performs the following: 1. 调用方法，以确保该模块可以颁发有效的登录请求。Invokes the method to ensure that a valid sign-in request can be issued by the module. 2. 调用方法从模块配置的属性创建登录请求。Invokes the method to create the sign-in request from the properties configured on the module. 3. 调用方法来引发事件。Invokes the method to raise the event. 您可以取消重定向或修改此事件的事件处理程序中的登录请求消息。You can cancel the redirect or modify the sign-in request message in the event handler for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wreply 参数是可选的。The wreply parameter is optional. 如果属性设置为`null`或空字符串，wreply 参数不包含在登录请求。If the property is set to `null` or an empty string, the wreply parameter is not included in the sign-in request. Wreply 参数由 STS 用于确定令牌颁发后重定向到用户的位置。The wreply parameter is used by the STS to decide where to redirect the user to after token issuance. 不建议 sts 盲目地使用此地址将用户重定向，因为此类重定向有安全漏洞。It is not advisable for the STS to blindly use this address to redirect the user as such redirection has security vulnerabilities. （可能通过比较到一组预配置的答复地址用于用途或某些其他方法） 的 STS 必须验证的答复地址以确保，回复发送到理解广为人知且安全的位置。The reply address must be validated by the STS (possibly by comparing to a set of preconfigured reply addresses for the purposes or some other method) to make sure that the reply is being sent to understood well known and secure location.

summary.span: 当安全标记已从安全标记服务 (STS) 获得时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a security token has been received from a security token service (STS).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以添加事件处理程序，它验证之前修改令牌。You can add an event handler to modify the token before it is validated. 在事件处理程序可以访问的安全令牌通过属性。In the event handler you can access the security token through the property. 事件是可取消的事件，可以设置属性`true`以终止的 WS 联合身份验证登录响应消息的处理的事件处理中。The event is a cancelable event, you can set the property to `true` in an event handler to terminate processing of the WS-Federation sign-in response message. 从引发此事件在事件处理程序委托处理从安全令牌服务 (STS) 收到的 WS 联合身份验证登录响应消息 ("wsignin1.0") 时。This event is raised from inside the event-handler delegate when processing a WS-Federation sign-in response message ("wsignin1.0") received from the security token service (STS). 安全令牌具有反序列化从 wresult 或 wresultptr 参数在登录响应消息中，但之前验证安全令牌后，它会引发。It is raised just after a security token has been deserialized from the wresult or the wresultptr parameter in the sign-in response message, but before the security token is validated. ## Examples [!code-csharp[WifWSFAM#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifwsfam/cs/webapplication1/global.asax.cs#6)]

span.span: Occurs after a security token that was received from the security token service (STS) has been validated but before the session security token is created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以添加事件处理程序来修改在处理安全令牌服务 (STS) 中的 WS 联合身份验证登录响应消息，然后使用它来创建会话令牌时创建的主体。You can add an event handler to modify the principal created while processing a WS-Federation sign-in response message from a security token service (STS) before it is used to create the session token. 在事件处理程序中，你可以访问通过主体属性。In the event handler, you can access the principal through the property. 事件是可取消的事件，可以设置属性`true`以终止的 WS 联合身份验证登录响应消息的处理的事件处理中。The event is a cancelable event, you can set the property to `true` in an event handler to terminate processing of the WS-Federation sign-in response message. 从引发此事件在事件处理程序委托处理从安全令牌服务 (STS) 收到的 WS 联合身份验证登录响应消息 ("wsignin1.0") 时。This event is raised from inside the event-handler delegate when processing a WS-Federation sign-in response message ("wsignin1.0") received from the security token service (STS). 将引发此事件恰好在从 wresult 已反序列化的安全令牌后或通过验证登录响应消息中的 wresultptr 参数后，和会话安全令牌创建。It is raised just after the security token that was deserialized from the wresult or the wresultptr parameter in the sign-in response message has been validated, and before the session security token is created. ## Examples [!code-csharp[WifWSFAM#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifwsfam/cs/webapplication1/global.asax.cs#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以添加事件处理程序修改的会话令牌，然后将它用于设置线程主体，并且会写入到会话 cookie。You can add an event handler to modify the session token before it is used to set the thread principal and is written to the session cookie. 在事件处理程序中，你可以访问通过的会话令牌属性。In the event handler, you can access the session token through the property. 你可以指定是否应通过设置编写的会话 cookie属性。You can specify whether a session cookie should be written by setting the property. 从引发此事件在事件处理程序委托处理从安全令牌服务 (STS) 收到的 WS 联合身份验证登录响应消息 ("wsignin1.0") 时。This event is raised from inside the event-handler delegate when processing a WS-Federation sign-in response message ("wsignin1.0") received from the security token service (STS). 将引发此事件恰好在从 wresult 已反序列化的安全令牌后或登录响应消息中的 wresultptr 参数已经过验证，并在声明之前主体设置上(并在属性).It is raised just after the security token that was deserialized from the wresult or the wresultptr parameter in the sign-in response message has been validated, and before the claims principal is set on the (and on the property of ). > [!IMPORTANT] > 若要运行 Microsoft 建议提供的处理程序的会话在引用模式下， global.asax.cs 文件和设置中的事件令牌上的属性中传递属性。To operate sessions in reference mode, Microsoft recommends providing a handler for the event in the global.asax.cs file and setting the property on the token passed in the property. 这将确保会话令牌在为每个请求的引用模式下运行，并且通过仅设置偏好会话身份验证模块上的属性。This will ensure that the session token operates in reference mode for every request and is favored over merely setting the property on the Session Authentication Module. ## Examples [!code-csharp[WifWSFAM#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifwsfam/cs/webapplication1/global.asax.cs#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当方法调用，生成的登录消息包含具有以下格式的 wctx 参数： `ru=returnUrl&cx=SignInContext&rm=rememberMeSet&id=uniqueId`。When the method is invoked, the sign-in message that is generated contains a wctx parameter that has the following format: `ru=returnUrl&cx=SignInContext&rm=rememberMeSet&id=uniqueId`. 值存储在`cx`参数。The value of the is stored in the `cx` parameter. 可以在代码中直接调用。 can be called directly from your code. 它也称为 WSFAM 执行被动重定向时以及当任一方法或由应用程序代码调用方法。It is also called when the WSFAM is performing passive redirects and also when either the method or the method is invoked by application code. 虽然 WSFAM 节省但登录请求消息，如果值由你的应用程序响应处理过程中的值，你必须用于提取从 wctx 参数登录响应消息中提供的逻辑。Although the WSFAM saves the value in sign-in request messages, if the value is used by your application during response processing, you must provide the logic for extracting it from the wctx parameter in the sign-in response message. 有关格式和处理 wctx 参数的详细信息，请参阅方法。For more information about the format and processing of the wctx parameter, see the method.

Cookie 可能会删除在客户端，例如，因此将永远不会引发此事件。Cookies may be deleted at the client side, for example, so this event would never be raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法执行删除当前会话，并引发相应的注销事件的实际的工作。This method performs the actual work of deleting the current session and raising the appropriate sign-out events. 方法执行以下任务：The method does the following: 1. 调用方法来引发事件。Invokes the method to raise the event. 事件处理程序可以提供任何必要的处理之前删除该会话。An event handler can provide any necessary processing before the session is deleted. 属性设置为根据`isIPRequest`参数。The property is set according to the `isIPRequest` parameter. 2. 调用方法在当前会话的身份验证管理器，若要删除会话 cookie。Calls the method on the current session authentication manager to delete the session cookie. 调用方法来引发事件。Invokes the method to raise the event. 3. 如果注销的处理过程中发生错误，将调用方法来引发事件。If an error occurs during sign-out processing, invokes the method to raise the event. 事件处理程序可以取消处理并防止出现异常被返回到调用方 An event handler can cancel the processing and prevent an exception from being returned to the caller of 你可以调用方法替换`isIPRequest`参数集`false`以注销会话，而不执行重定向。You can call the method with the `isIPRequest` parameter set `false` to sign out of a session without performing a redirect. 该方法最终由所有其他重载的调用方法 (与`isIPRequest`参数设置为`false`) 来执行处理注销。The method is ultimately called by all of the other overloaded methods (with the `isIPRequest` parameter set to `false`) to perform the sign out handling. 此方法叫做从方法替换`isIPRequest`参数集`true`以注销的会话时它正在处理的 WS 联合身份验证的注销清理消息 ("wsignoutcleanup1.0")。The method is called from the method with the `isIPRequest` parameter set `true` to sign out of the session when it is processing a WS-Federation sign-out clean-up message ("wsignoutcleanup1.0"). 任何注销请求消息 ("wsignout1.0") 不发送到安全令牌服务 (STS)。No sign-out request message ("wsignout1.0") is sent to the security token service (STS). 若要在使用 WS 联合身份验证协议的 STS 注销，使用方法。To sign-out at the STS using WS-Federation protocol, use the method.

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the wreply parameter to use during WS-Federation sign-out requests ("wsignout1.0").

value.span: 通过注销以下 WS-Federation 协议，该客户端应由安全标记服务 (STS) 的重定向到 URL。

span.span: The URL to which the client should be redirected by the security token service (STS) following sign-out through the WS-Federation protocol.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，此属性的初始化`signOutReply`属性[ <wsFederation> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/wsfederation.md)配置文件中的元素。By default, this property is initialized from the `signOutReply` attribute of the [<wsFederation>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/wsfederation.md) element in the configuration file. 它用于表示 WS 联合身份验证注销请求中的 wreply 参数。It is intended to represent the wreply parameter in a WS-Federation sign-out request. Wreply 参数是可选的。The wreply parameter is optional. 如果属性设置为`null`或空字符串，wreply 参数不包含在注销请求。If the property is set to `null` or an empty string, the wreply parameter is not included in the sign-out request. WSFAM 不直接使用此属性。The WSFAM does not use this property directly. 但是，你可以将它传递到方法时执行 Ws-federation 注销你的代码，或者也可以将其传递到方法以创建完整的 WS 联合身份验证注销 URL。However, you can pass it to the method when performing WS-Federation sign-out from your code or you can pass it to the method to create a complete WS-Federation sign-out URL.
